title: 你们正式玩minecraft是哪个版本？
author: samer-dtg

replies.author: wocaocaocaocao
replies.txt_content: 从1.4.7开始玩,玩到1.6.2时被缠住了不想到1.7= =

replies.author: LeiShenZhiJiong
replies.txt_content: 1.5.1开始，到1.6.4，1.7.2尝试了一下不玩了，最后是回归1.6.4。

replies.author: 音乐家七月天
replies.txt_content: 那时候1.2.5还没出来Σ( ° △ °|||)︴当时在玩1.8Beta

replies.author: rrppgg
replies.txt_content: 才完第一天，版本1.4.6，其他版本没试过

replies.author: samer-dtg
replies.txt_content:
